---
title: Create Unbond Transaction
slug: /guides/staking-api/polkadot/undelegate/create-unbond-transaction
---

Now that the account is chilled, submit an unbond transaction to unbond from the stake.
Once again, there are no required inputs for this action.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-6}
curl -X PUT 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/86d4a5d4-1c75-4c6a-926d-ab930e57f504/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "create_unbond_tx",
  "inputs": {}
}'
```

### Response

The response indicates four possible `actions` :

- `refresh_unbond_tx` &mdash; If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction payload (ie. the nonce needs to be updated)
- `sign_unbond_tx` &mdash; Submit a signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network
- `confirm_unbond_tx_by_hash` &mdash; Submit a previously completed transaction hash to continue the flow.
- `assign_unstaking_data` &mdash; Used to alter the unstaking data, if needed. Otherwise, the previously submitted default values are used.

We will choose `sign_unbond_tx`, which indicates one input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` &mdash; The signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network

#### Sample Response

```json {4,7,11,14,27,75,78,92,103}
{
  "id": "6c37da8a-4b69-44db-b0df-6fb9af75f24b",
  "operation": "unstaking",
  "state": "unbond_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_unbond_tx",
      "inputs": []
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_unbond_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "sign_payload",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null,
          "signers": ["5CtTpJSdf13cbBZU4RX7EHkEaJ53pVaAF5XJosmusXJ5gdDg"],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "array": true,
          "default_value": null,
          "element_type": "signature_data",
          "signers": ["5CtTpJSdf13cbBZU4RX7EHkEaJ53pVaAF5XJosmusXJ5gdDg"],
```
